name: Clippy
description: Clippy is a screen, audio and camera recorder extension tool

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn cp && NODE_ENV=production rollup -c
scripts.zip:chrome: NODE_ENV=production BROWSER=chrome yarn build && (cd dist; zip -r ../chrome.zip .)
scripts.zip:firefox: NODE_ENV=production BROWSER=firefox yarn build && (cd dist; zip -r ../firefox.zip .)
scripts.zip: npm run zip:firefox && npm run zip:chrome

author: Haikel Fazzani
